Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2015 10:59PM - edited Dec 18, 2015 11:00PM by lovelife38 Hello sgarr, I had the same symptoms you had. I went to my primary doctor who treated me with antibiotics for 10 days which didn't help. I had to demand a mammo. My mammo came back negative, but I still knew something was wrong because of the redness, swelling and shooting pain. I asked for a ultrasound and there was the lump found!! 0.6mm. My skin punch biopsy was negative. IBC is very aggressive and needs to be treated immediately, due to the aggressiveness. Please push for ultrasound because IBC usually presents without a lump. Be your own advocate.
Posts.Title: Was tested for IBC - Came back negative, but concerned still sgarr Mamiya
